title: Run workflow with additional_data
content:
workflow.print_response(
    input="AI trends in 2024",
    additional_data={
        "user_email": "michael@dundermifflin.com",
        "priority": "high",
        "client_type": "enterprise",
        "budget": "$50000",
        "deadline": "2024-12-15"
    },
    markdown=True,
    stream=True
)
```
